forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 16 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this late afternoon, the atmosphere strikes a balance between sunny optimism and the subtle embrace of coastal winds. The mild warmth wraps the city, as temperatures hover around a pleasant 62 degrees, before gently sliding toward the mid-50s. The west-southwest wind, brisk at 24 miles per hour with gusts whispering as high as 30, stirs a sense of vitality in the air, pushing any lingering fog further into the embrace of the bay. While the sprawling city reveals its outlines against the backdrop of blue sky, the horizon carries a delicate veil of clouds, hinting at a slightly more subdued evening.

As twilight approaches, the clouds will deepen, but they remain soft and unthreatening. Those venturing out might consider layering—perhaps a light sweater to offset the cool breeze, complemented by a comfortable pair of jeans. With the golden hour drawing near, a stroll along the Embarcadero offers a chance to soak in the beauty of the evening, as the city transforms and the lights begin to shimmer like stars reflected on water. Embrace the simplicity of the day; whether it’s finding a cozy spot for dinner or enjoying a moment of serenity by the bay, the evening promises a soothing reprieve from daily bustle, presenting an opportunity to connect with the essence of the city.
